content:
Over the last few months I've sometimes added GitHub issues for small possible typos at the GitHub page for MoP.

https://github.com/hrmacbeth/math2001/issues

None have had any response - is there a better place to send them?
I expect that @Heather Macbeth is busy with other things. It should be the correct place to report typos.
rzeta0 has marked this topic as resolved.
